items.summary: Fix the responsive layout so the dashboard renders its intended desktop layout on large screens (e.g., `lg:grid-cols-2` and `lg:grid-cols-3` in `frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx`) instead of remaining in a phone/mobile layout on desktop, without changing the existing visual design, component structure, or content.

Update the daily quote behavior so the quote automatically updates when the calendar day changes (including when the tab remains open past midnight), while preserving the existing localStorage cache behavior and keeping the DailyQuote UI/markup unchanged.
